column4: warbo: so it's really new, then?  Is there a guide for the text install?  I can work on command line a little, but am very new.  (at work we use embedded QNX, but do limited tasks on it.)
warbo: I never see hd0, I'm only seeing hda1, hdb1
grub uses different names, hda in linux is hd0 in grub
warbo: where will I see grub designations instead of linux designations? In the files you mentioned?
